snippet: Ireland's government will select bookrunners and co-lead managers to assist a potential share sale of state-owned Allied Irish Banks (AIB), it said on Friday, in a further signal that it could launch an IPO by May....

headline.main: Walls, Drones and Mines: Turkey Tightens Border as Syria Incursion Deepens
headline.print_headline: Walls, Drones and Mines: Turkey Tightens Border as Syria Incursion Deepens

lead_paragraph: Ireland's government will select bookrunners and co-lead managers to assist a potential share sale of state-owned Allied Irish Banks (AIB), it said on Friday, in a further signal that it could launch an IPO by May.
